Description: Trefoil lip sherd with part of shoulder of Chian pottery oinochoe; white slip; exterior glazed black (fired orange); plastic ring at turn to shoulder; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see Boardman 1967 144 fig. 92 no. 589. The Emporio sherd was found in a layer with a date range of 690-550BC.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 717, no. 756)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0047) (phase 2)
Condition: Part has been lost - glue on edge to left, and Bernand saw more
